name: Young Green Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Woodland Stalker
special_abilities.desc: When in a forested area, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:animal messenger, tongues
